title: M1: Languages of the European Charter for Regional or Minority Languages
authorComments: * DIFFICULTY: intermediate * SUPERVISION: teacher-guided. * ESTIMATED ANSWERING TIME: 20 minutes. * LANGUAGE-SPECIFIC CONTENT: none * ADAPTATION TO OTHER LANGUAGES: not necessary. * COMMENTS FOR INSTRUCTORS: This question is on the European Charter for Regional or Minority Languages (ECRML). This charter is a European treaty (CETS 148) adopted in 1992 under the auspices of the Council of Europe to protect and promote historical regional and minority languages in Europe. I might be a teadious task as there are many languages (81). The aim of the task it to read all (and hopefully learn many) of the languages. Let the students take their time to do it.
